However, the night ended in tragedy when Mr. Boddy was found dead in one of the rooms of Tudor Mansion in the early hours of the morning. The following persons of interest have been identified as suspects:

 Monsieur Brunette
 Professor Plum
 Miss Peach

And the following weapons were found on the premises:

 Candlestick
 Poison

The murder could only have occured in one of the following rooms:

1. Billiard Room
2. Courtyard
3. Lounge

The rooms are laid out as follows:

  N N  
W 1|2 E
W 3|- E
  S S  

The exact time of the murder is a bit uncertain, but it has been narrowed down to one of the following times:

 10:30 PM
 11:00 PM
 11:30 PM
 12:00 AM

At every time the suspects and Mr. Boddy either stayed in their current room or moved to an orthogonally adjacent room (north, south, east, or west). Weapons could be moved by suspects between rooms as well.

Each suspect uniquely had one of the following possible motives for killing Mr. Boddy:

 Anger
 Pride
 Fear

For the murder to occur, the murderer and Mr. Boddy must have been alone in a room with at least one weapon at some point in the night. Any clue about Mr. Boddy's whereabouts should be read as Mr. Boddy (dead or alive) ...

The available clues are as follows:

- Miss Peach was in the room just south of Mr. Boddy at 11:00 PM
- Mr. Boddy was in the room just east of the Poison at 12:00 AM
- Mr. Boddy and the Poison were in the Billiard Room together at least once
- The suspect motivated by Fear moved the Candlestick from the Courtyard to the Billiard Room at 12:00 AM
- The murderer was in the Courtyard at 10:30 PM or the murder weapon was in the Billiard Room at 11:00 PM
- Mr. Boddy was in the Billiard Room at 11:00 PM if and only if Miss Peach was in the Lounge at 10:30 PM
- Professor Plum and Monsieur Brunette were in the Billiard Room together at least once
- Professor Plum was in the Lounge at 10:30 PM or the suspect motivated by Fear was in the Lounge at 11:30 PM
- The suspect motivated by Pride was in the Courtyard at 12:00 AM if and only if the Candlestick was in the Billiard Room at 11:30 PM
- Mr. Boddy was in the Courtyard at 10:30 PM if and only if the suspect motivated by Anger was in the Lounge at 10:30 PM
- Professor Plum moved from the Lounge to the Billiard Room at 11:30 PM
- The murderer was in the Courtyard at 11:00 PM
- Miss Peach was in the room just east of Monsieur Brunette at 12:00 AM

Please answer the following question(s):

A. Who murdered Mr. Boddy?
B. What weapon did the murderer use?
C. Where was the murder committed?
D. When did the murder occur?
E. Why did the murderer do it?
